name: BartonellosisTestsForBartonellaSppNucleicAcid
title: Bartonellosis (Tests for Bartonella spp. Nucleic Acid)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Bartonella spp. Nucleic Acid),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed),(Inclusion Criteria: Bartonella spp. Nucleic Acid),(Exclusion Criteria: None)
